official_title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to enhance the safety of passengers and employees on ferries operating on Puget Sound.

summary.text: Amends Federal maritime law to require that ferry vessels operating on certain waters between the State of Washington and Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada (including Puget Sound, Washington), be equipped with life rafts to accommodate all passengers and employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to enhance the safety of passengers and employees on ferries operating on Puget Sound.
